item.title: A New Page
item.description: Raison d’Etre I’ve always had a looming feeling that I’m horrible at documenting things; which is weird. You’d think that someone with a perpetual narration going in her head would have no problem pouring her thoughts down to writing. This has manifested in an ugly way, three months into my new job. I am now knee deep in a long, strenuous analytics project with no doc in sight. And the cherry on top is?
